response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be far beyond its face value of $8,000. Considering its high quality and potential impact, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This opportunity not only secures a remarkable investment but also opens up possibilities for long-term benefits. I look forward to your consideration and the chance to discuss how this product can elevate your goals.", "product_price": 12000}
